item.title: How to use the GitLab API
item.description: How to Use the GitLab API Sometimes, when you don’t use a monorepo, it may be necessary to handle multiple repositories at once. GitLab provides an easy way to do that, even with a free account! All you have to do is find what you need in their documentation. The first step, is to create an access token, for that go to the profile page and find the Access Tokens' settings.
